item.title: Top 5 Books That Led Me to the Catholic Church
item.author: thecogcatholic@outlook.com (Darren)
item.description: While there is only one path to God – through Jesus Christ Our Lord – there are many paths to his Church. These paths are oftentimes paved with books. In my case, God used certain writings to help me overcome my particular intellectual and spiritual roadblocks. Not everyone has my background, my roadblocks. Not each book that meant something to me will mean something to you. God’s ways of reaching our hearts and minds are specially tailored to every person.
